org.eclipse.jdt.debug.core.IJavaType

Packages that use IJavaType
Package
Description
org.eclipse.jdt.debug.core
Provides an implementation of a debug model based on JPDA (Java Platform Debug Architecture).

  • Uses of IJavaType in org.eclipse.jdt.debug.core

    Subinterfaces of IJavaType in org.eclipse.jdt.debug.core
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    IJavaArrayType
    The type of an array on a Java debug target.
    interface 
    IJavaClassType
    The class of an object on a Java debug target.
    interface 
    IJavaInterfaceType
    An interface an object implements on a Java debug target.
    interface 
    IJavaReferenceType
    Represents the type of an object in a virtual machine - including classes, interfaces and array types.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IJavaType
    IJavaArrayType.getComponentType()
    Returns the type of the elements in this array.
    IJavaType

    Returns the type that declares this variable.
    IJavaType
    IJavaClassObject.getInstanceType()
    Returns the type associated with instances of this class.
    IJavaType
    IJavaValue.getJavaType()
    Returns the type of this value, or null if this value represents the null value
    IJavaType
    IJavaVariable.getJavaType()
    Returns the declared type of this variable.
    IJavaType[]
    IJavaDebugTarget.getJavaTypes(String name)
    Returns the types loaded in this debug target with the given fully qualified name, or null of no type with the given name is loaded.
